name: Jumping on Eggshells
description:
Whisk it all to bring Jack's golden egg home in one piece! Jack got too shell-fish while in the giant's lair and took the largest golden egg he could carry. While you're carrying the egg, you'll be too eggs-hausted to run and jump, so make sure to toss it into the air to gain a burst of speed. Find your way through the obstacles to the eggs-it in each level without letting your precious cargo hit the walls or floor!

We promise, there aren't this many egg-related yolks in the actual game.
